DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate performance criterion one week daily wear determine Study Test contact lens performs equivalently comfilcon A contact lenses term measurement subjective rating visual performance .
DOC.brief_title: One Week Assessment Lens With Novel Optical Profile
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , single site , daily wear , double mask , randomize bilateral cross dispense study binocular wear Study Test Lens comfilcon A sphere contact lenses 1 week daily wear . Assessments obtain upon dispense lens pair follow 1 week daily lens use .
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : Oculovisual examination last two year Between 18 35 year age full legal capacity volunteer Has read understood inform consent letter Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule Is correctable visual acuity 20/25 better ( eye ) habitual correction 20/20 best correct Currently wear , previously successfully worn , soft contact lenses 1.00D ( Diopter ) 4.00D Spherical Contact Lens Rx 1.00 4.00 spectacle cylinder < 0.75 Has wear lens least 12 hour initial visit Has subjective response baseline , indicate suitability study Currently spend minimum 4 hour day ; 5 day week digital device replicate time study period Is willing able wear study contact lenses minimum 10 hour per day ; 5 day week . A person exclude study he/she : Has never wear contact lenses Any systemic disease affect ocular health Is use systemic topical medication affect ocular health Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical study product use study . Has ocular pathology anomaly would affect wear lens Has persistent , clinically significant corneal conjunctival stain use sodium fluorescein dye Is aphakic Has anisometropia > 1.00 Has undergone corneal refractive surgery Has strabismus Has ocular amblyopia > = 1 line HC ( High Contrast ) Visual Acuity Is participate type eye related clinical research study
